QuestData.Title: Tranquillien Besieged
QuestData.Description:
Rommath has opened the way for us to quickly travel to Tranquillien. I warn you, it's already a bloody battlefield.
Take the portal, and I will be along right after you.
And $n... keep an eye on Salandria. She may have excelled in her training thus far, but she has yet to be tested like this.
